title: Loving Leila
description: ğ‘»ğ’‰ğ’Šğ’” ğ’ƒğ’ğ’ğ’Œ ğ’Šğ’” ğ’„ğ’–ğ’“ğ’“ğ’†ğ’ğ’•ğ’ğ’š ğ’ğ’ğ’• ğ’‚ğ’—ğ’‚ğ’Šğ’ğ’‚ğ’ƒğ’ğ’†. ğ‘°ğ’• ğ’Šğ’” ğ’Šğ’ ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ’‘ğ’“ğ’ğ’„ğ’†ğ’”ğ’” ğ’ğ’‡ ğ’ƒğ’†ğ’Šğ’ğ’ˆ ğ’“ğ’†ğ’˜ğ’ğ’“ğ’Œğ’†ğ’… ğ’‚ğ’ğ’… ğ’˜ğ’Šğ’ğ’ ğ’ƒğ’† ğ’“ğ’†ğ’ğ’†ğ’‚ğ’”ğ’† ğ’Šğ’ ğ’•ğ’‰ğ’† ğ‘­ğ’‚ğ’ğ’ ğ’ğ’‡ 2024 ğ’‚ğ’” ğ’‘ğ’‚ğ’“ğ’• ğ’ğ’‡ ğ’‚ ğ’ğ’†ğ’˜ ğ’”ğ’†ğ’“ğ’Šğ’†ğ’”. ğ‘ºğ’ ğ’Œğ’†ğ’†ğ’‘ ğ’‚ğ’ ğ’†ğ’šğ’† ğ’ğ’–ğ’• ğ’‡ğ’ğ’“ ğ’Šğ’•.Loving Leila is part of Kristen Probyâ€™s With Me in Seattle UniverseWhen fate offers you a second chance, grab it with both hands.Navy SEAL Kyle â€œMaverickâ€ Jackson made the biggest mistake of his life walking away from Leila Asherton five years ago. Now he's been sent on a mission to rescue hostages on a luxury cruise liner, and fate seems to be offering him a second chance when Leila turns out to be one of the hostages.Leila Asherton cannot believe her bad luck when the ship sheâ€™s on is hijacked at sea. Things seem dire until the rescue team arrives -- and then they seem bleak. The rescue team includes the man who broke her heart. Surely Lady luck can't really be this cruel.Kyle is determined to take this second chance at loving Leila. Only thing is, will Leila allow him back into her life?
author: Dorothy Ewels
